name: "Queen of the South": Episode 1 - "Piloto" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Teresa Mendoza, the titular character, announced that she had a "drug of choice" a few seconds into the pilot. What was she referring to?
questions.explanation:
A man from Texas.

	The man was a member of a drug cartel who rescued her from her pimp. She was from Mexico and he was from Texas. After beating up her boss, he took her in with the rest of the people he was with that night.

questions.text: Who played Teresa in the episode?
questions.explanation:
Alice Braga.

	Braga took on the role for the American version of the show. The show is based on a book from author Arturo Perez-Reverte called "La Reina del Sur". There was also a telenovela called by the same name that adapted the book.  Kate del Castillo played Teresa in the Spanish language version.

questions.text: Which character was shot in the head during the opening scene of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Teresa Mendoza.

	The show opened in the future (compared to the rest of the episode). Teresa was standing in front of a large picture window. The voice over explained that she ran the largest drug empire in the western hemisphere. Then a bullet burst through the window, Teresa dropped to the floor and the camera panned down to show blood oozing out of her mouth.

questions.text: Guero gave Teresa a cell phone that would only ring if he died.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He taught her how to use a hand gun, set up a safe house and hid millions of dollars and cocaine in the house. He then gave her a cell phone and said if it ever rang, he was dead and she needed to run. Her "go bag" had several other items in it as well, including a passport. Just one scene later, the phone rang and the voice on the other end notified her of his death.

questions.text: Which character got into a fight with his wife when he announced he was running for governor?
questions.explanation:
Epifanio Vargas.

	Epifanio was the don of the drug cartel that the others worked for. Guero was killed after he was caught stealing from the cartel. Don Vargas told his wife, during a party, that he was going to run for governor and needed to distance himself from the drug cartel, which caused them to fight.

questions.text: Who did Teresa shoot while attempting to make her escape from Mexico?
questions.explanation:
Don Vargas' driver.

	She held a gun to both Don Vargas and the driver's heads and demanded they stop the vehicle. After several attempts when neither tried to stop, she shot the driver and the vehicle went off the road and overturned.

questions.text: Who was Guero working with when he was killed?
questions.explanation:
Chino.

	Chino was Guero's partner in stealing from the drug cartel. Chino lived through the attack that killed Guero, but was then attacked in his home. His wife Brenda, and son, escaped the house with Teresa, but were soon separated from her.

questions.text: After Teresa was kidnapped, what country was she taken to?
questions.explanation:
America.

	She didn't know at first that she had been moved to another country. After escaping the zip ties that had her immobilized, she punched through mirror and kept a piece of the glass. That's when Camila Vargas walked in and the two had a chat. Camila had left for America when her husband announced he was running for governor.

questions.text: Where did Teresa hide the book that Guero had said would save her life if she ever needed it?
questions.correct: In the wall at a gas station.
options: Behind a panel in her car.
It was stolen from her and dropped in a dumpster.
In a hidden compartment in her luggage.
questions.explanation:
In the wall at a gas station.

	Guero had told her not to read the book, but to take it to Don Vargas and trade it for her life if she ever needed to. She took the book to him, and he instead tried to ignore her. After she stole it back from him, she hid it just before being kidnapped from the gas station bathroom.

questions.text: Teresa was never shown doing any type of illegal drug during the episode.
questions.explanation:
False.

	On at least two occasions she was seen snorting cocaine. Once in the bathroom the night she met Guero, then again the night Guero died after getting to the safe house.
